description.sun-moon:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.
description.sword-shield:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
